description: Pre-transformation John. HS → early college. Family tension, 723-day relationship, early ECD involvement. Building the foundation.
era_name: The Founding,Era of Transition (2005-2005),Era of Transition (2006-2006)

description: Reconciliation begins. 'My oh my, how the times have changed.' Crazy Chili Dog post signals inner restlessness.
The year everything changed. Coming out ('the power of an internal desire liberated!'). ECD peak. New identity forged. Yeah I Said It: 'I've never felt happier to be alive.'
Post-threshold navigation. ECD retirement (171 events, legacy secured). College graduation. Career launch at Sunrise. Torn labrum surgery. New friendships forming.
era_name: Era of Intense Activity (2009-2009),The Golden Era,Era of Intense Activity (2011-2011)

description: Deepening identity. The Influlist (crediting origins). Merrie Melodies (mapping friendships to music). Career advancing. WrestleMania streaks continuing.
era_name: Era of Intense Activity (2012-2012),Era of Intense Activity (2013-2013)

description: The most documented year. Undertaker handshake (20-year dream fulfilled through 5 friends). Peak joy. But also peak vulnerability — everything desired has been achieved. Now what?
Quieter years. 2015 under-documented. 2017: spinal surgery — the body rebels. Physical ordeal forces reassessment.
era_name: Era of Intense Activity (2015-2015),Era of Intense Activity (2016-2016),The Crucible

description: Post-surgery comeback. Mediterranean cruise. 1,000th CHA game. COVID forces universal pause. Inner strength tested differently.
era_name: Era of Intense Activity (2018-2018),Renaissance,Era of Intense Activity (2020-2020)

description: The mature chapter. Engagement. Executive Director promotion. 20th WrestleMania. Relationship transition in 2025. The elixir is wisdom: 'When you enjoy the journeys, the destinations magnify.'
career_milestones: Sr. Resident Care Coordinator, Executive Director
era_name: Era of Intense Activity (2021-2021),The Summit,Era of Intense Activity (2023-2023),Era of Intense Activity (2024-2024),Era of Intense Activity (2025-2025),New Horizons
